title: Athletic Bilbao v Arsenal: Champions League – live
summary: The league stage of the season starts in Bilbao, with Barry Glendenning providing a minute-by-minute report. Fans can expect live updates on the action as it unfolds. Excitement builds as teams compete for victory.

title: Kash Patel says FBI investigating Discord group chat where Charlie Kirk shooting suspect allegedly confessed – live
summary: The FBI director faced intense questioning from the Senate Judiciary Committee, receiving criticism for his handling of the Kirk shooting investigation. Lawmakers scrutinized his actions and social media posts related to the case. The hearing underscores heightened concerns over accountability within the FBI.

title: Tottenham v Villarreal: Champions League – live
summary: The Europa League holders have returned to the competition in north London. A minute-by-minute report is provided by Scott Murray. Fans can follow the match updates and highlights as they unfold.

title: Real Madrid v Marseille, Juventus v Dortmund, and more: Champions League – live
summary: Rob Smyth will provide comprehensive coverage of the league stage opening night, including updates on all the goals scored. Fans can stay informed with the latest news surrounding the matches. Don't miss out on the excitement as the league kicks off!

title: Jaguar Land Rover extends production shutdown after cyber-attack
summary: A car manufacturer has announced a temporary halt in production until at least September 24. This decision comes as the company conducts ongoing investigations. Specific details regarding the nature of the investigations have not been disclosed.
